entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with flurries beginning near noon and ending this afternoon. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
